execution_plan.description: Compute the maximum product price across all products.
execution_plan.query: SELECT MAX(product_price) AS max_price FROM Products;

execution_plan.description: Retrieve color, description and size for products priced below the maximum price returned in step 1.
execution_plan.query: SELECT product_color, product_description, product_size FROM Products WHERE product_price < $step1.max_price;
